enum embree::assipm_shading_type embree::Assimp ( const Parms &  parms)

Implements an Assim format material which is quite generic.

This material is intended to store a range of material effect that can capture the Assim I/O library. Therefore it is quite generic... Full description can be seen \

Construction from parameters.
